Hi Randolph,


I recommend "Digital Modeling of Material Appearance" by Dorsey,  
Rushmeier and Sillion (ISBN 978-0-12-221181-2).  Section 5.7 has a  
nice explanation of scattering in volumes that covers the basic  
principles.


Best,
